name: Add Social Bookmarks
author: Aditya Subawa

sections.description:
This plugin is for wordpress users, both beginner and expert.function is to distribute your articles to popular social bookmarking sites. This plugin provides social bookmarking 8 favorites such as,Facebook, twitter, reddit, digg, technorati, stumbleupon, delicious and yahoo buzz.

This plugin requires no configuration at all. simply activate and the plugin will be installed under your wordpress post articles.

image in the folder “images” in directory installation of this plugin ‘/wp-content/plugins/wp-add-socialbookmarks/images’. if you want to change an image, just need a little change. and can be customized to the Editor Plugin.

Arbitrary section

Refer Installation and FAQ section for all required information

A brief Markdown Example

Ordered list:

  1. WP Add Social Bookmarks plugin available so far
  2. No configuration required at all
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload WP-Add-Social-Bookmarks.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory. You can do this using ‘Upload’ functionality provided in plugins section of your wordpress dashboard
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You are all set. Start bookmarking now
sections.faq:
How to add more bookmarks?

this time, to change social bookmark list by editing the. php file. you must understand the concept of adding each URL you want, to add more social bookmarks.

How To Change Image?

image in the folder “images” in directory installation of this plugin ‘/wp-content/plugins/wp-add-socialbookmarks/images’. if you want to change an image, just need a little change.Change exiting images with your own images. keep image name, do not change the name of images.

short_description: WP Add Social Bookmarks + Animation effect is a plug-in designed to add major social bookmarks to your website.
